column5: The MSc Sustainable Maritime Operations, awarded by the University of Plymouth, can be studied at PgCert, PgDip and Master’s levels.Delivered via part-time distance learning, MLA College provides a flexible approach to study, allowing it to easily fit around your work and life commitments.About the Programme Built with senior managers in mind, the MSc will provide you with a deep knowledge of the physical and biological issues posed to the marine environment by maritime activities. You will design, develop, test and critically evaluate sustainable operations in a number of contexts; energy delivery, coastal zone management, financial and operational management.Modules The PgCert contains three modules;
